1221.content: Why does Lucy Heartfelia wear diapers?

12212.content: What type of job was it.
12212.title: A job requires her to wear one

choices: Lucy needs to go 1 or 2 l
122122.content:
Lucy was looking for a mission to do alone when.
"Looking for a person to take part in babysitting a 2 year old."
"Seems easy enough." Lucy said
Lucy packed up her stuff and took off for the clients house.
"Knock knock knock, hello anyone home?" Lucy asked
"Oh are you the mage that took the job?" A woman's voice loud speaker said
"Yes my name Lucy heartifila from the guild fairy tail" Lucy said showing her symbol
"Excellent I'll be right down please take a sit when your in" the woman said
Lucy couldn't believe her eyes this place was huge compared to the outside seeing a chair she took a sit feeling super comfy and relaxed already.
"I see your comfy" the woman said
"Oh my bad it's just I never sat in such a comfy chair before and this placed reminds me of my first house." Lucy said
"Oh don't worry about it my dear" the woman said
"But why don't we discuss the job on hand, oh and you can call me Emily." Emily said
"Yea you wanted me to babysit for you." Lucy said
"Will not exactly." Emily said
"Uh what you mean?" Lucy asked
"Well I asked you to be part of babysitting a 2 year old not to babysit a 2 year old." Emily
"What do you mean." Lucy said having a weird felling about this
"Well I would like you to be my baby girl for the next few weeks, that means diapers, bathing, feeding, etc." Emily said
"Uh?, I'm sorry but I don't think I can do this." Lucy said
"Well if you do I'll pay you 3 times, with yummy food and have someone to take care of you." Emily said
Lucy took some time to think.
"Plus if you leave without my permission you'll lose all of your bladder and blower control." Emily
"... Fine..." Lucy said seeing no way out of this without something humiliating happening to her.
"Good glad you see it my way, now stand up and come over here." Emily said
Lucy following Emily's orders
"Now strip down to just your underwear." Emily said
Lucy doing as told into she was down to just her underwear.
"Now with a little bit of magic you'll become my baby." Emily said as she grabbed Lucy butt making Lucy weep.
Lucy feeling her pink panties start to puffy out cause her legs to spread as her new diaper formed.
Next was her bra as it changed completely into a baby tee that just passed her boobs.
"Can't I get something else to wear?." Lucy asked blushing
"No you look adorable like that, oh one last thing." Emily said grabbing Lucy's top from the ground watching it change into a pacifier gag and strapping it into Lucy's mouth.
"There now it's all set." Emily said
Lucy couldn't believe this not only is she dressed like a 2 year old but she can't even leave without something happening and she completely helpless against this woman.
"Now here are the rules
1 you are to eat anything I give you
2 you are to not speak that is wat the gags for
3 your new bathroom is your diaper and if you need help I'll help you
4 your new bedtime is 8pm
5 you WILL not do anything by yourself you might always be with someone
6 if you break any of the rules you'll be in timeout and punishment as I see fit understand " Emily said.
Lucy nodding her head in agreement
What happens next.

Levy said hugging Lucy "so do you expect me to umm use these?" Lucy said "well of course you are my baby right." Levy said

1223213.content:
Juvias P.O.V

Juvia sat down at a table at the guild hall, almost all the boys were out on a S-Class mission and it was just the girls. Juvia felt pressure on her stomach she ignored it and kept drinking her lemonade. Juvia was talking to Lucy then, even through she was her love rival she was still a friend.

It's almost as juvias bottom has grown numb, because she couldn't feel the mess she was making. Soon she had very sagy panties and a puddle of pee where she was sitting. Lucy sniffed she smelled urine, she looked over at juvia who hasn't noticed her mess yet, she looked at the big puddle on the seat. "Juvia, did you..mess yourself?" Lucy questioned and looked at the puddle once again. Juvia couldn't tell if Lucy was disappointed or mad. She looked down in embarrassment and played with her hair.

As the night went on Wendy didn't know it but tonight would be a night were her hole life would change.
As Wendy woke up the first thing she noticed was that herself and her bed was completely soaked with piss, not only that but she also messed herself to.
"How could this happen?, I'm 12 years old!" Wendy said
""Is everything ok child?" Carla asked
"No everyone not ok!" Wendy shouted
"Child calm down go wash yourself in the shower I'll hand the bed" Carla said
As Wendy showered she could her Carla in the other cleaning her...mess. She felt bad but she knew something was wrong with her, she never wet or messed the bed before at even once in her life. Wendy finished her shower coming out in just a towel.
"So child what happened last night." Carla asked
"I don't know Carla, I just woke up in that mess I felt nothing." Wendy said
"I'll go get someone to come over and help you when I go get porlyusica (the elder healing woman) so wait here."
"Carla I don't need a babysitter." Wendy said
"Don't think of it as a babysitter I'm not going leave you alone if something happens to you and no one here to help." Wendy said
"Fine... Just don't make it Cana she won't let me live it down." Wendy said
"Stay safe Wendy I'll be back as soon as I can." Carla said

info.brief_description: A story about The Fairy Tail Males shrinking/ about the Fairy Tail females wearing diapers
info.description:
It's either a story about The Fairy Tail Males shrinking or about the Fairy Tail females wearing diapers. Or both.

Rules:
-No regression
-No gore
-No one gets fat
-No inflation
-Don't end the story
